header.title: snmpa_network_interface

erlref.modulesummary: Behaviour module for the SNMP agent network interface.

description.p: This module defines the behaviour of the agent network interface. A snmpa_network_interface compliant module must export the following functions:
The semantics of them and their exact signatures are explained below.
But this is not enough. There is also a set of mandatory messages which the network interface entity must be able to receive and be able to send. This is described in chapter snmp_agent_netif.

func.name: start_link(Prio, NoteStore, MasterAgent, Opts) -> {ok, Pid} | {error, Reason}

desc.p: NoteStore is the pid of the note-store process and MasterAgent is the pid of the master-agent process.
Opts is an (basically) implementation dependent list of options to the network interface process. There are however a number of options which must be handled: versions and verbosity.

func.name: info(Pid) -> [{Key, Value}]
func.fsummary: Return information about the running network interface process

desc.p: The info returned is basically up to the implementer to decide. This implementation provided by the application provides info about memory allocation and various socket information.
The info returned by this function is returned together with other info collected by the agent when the info function is called (tagged with with the key net_if).

func.name: verbosity(Pid, Verbosity) -> void()
func.fsummary: Change the verbosity of a running network interface process

desc.p: Change the verbosity of a running network interface process.

func.name: get_log_type(Pid) -> {ok, LogType} | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Get the Audit Trail Log type

desc.p: The Audit Trail Log is managed by the network interface process. So, it is this process that has to retrieve the actual log-type.

func.name: set_log_type(Pid, NewType) -> {ok, OldType} | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Change the Audit Trail Log type

desc.p: The Audit Trail Log is managed by the network interface process. So, it is this process that has to do the actual changing of the type.
